setup.title: Game Configuration
setup.subtitle: Set the number of players and the campaign tone

players.title: Number of Players
players.description: The investigative skill pool increases with more players so everyone can contribute.

purist.name: Purist
purist.description: Ordinary investigators facing cosmic horrors. More lethal and terrifying. Requires <1>3 Pillars of Sanity</1>. The Mythos destroys minds.

pulp.name: Pulp
pulp.description: 1930s-style action heroes. More resilient and capable. <1>Drives</1> instead of Pillars. More general skill points.

drive.title: ‚ö° Drive
drive.description: What motivates your investigator to face the horrors of the Mythos?

pillars.title: üåë Pillars of Sanity
pillars.description: Define the three anchors that keep your investigator's sanity. They must be a person, a place, and a belief.

investigative_step.title: Investigative Skills
investigative_step.subtitle: Allocate your points. Occupational skills have no maximum limit. Non-occupational skills have a maximum of {{max}} points.
investigative_step.rule_half_cost: Rule: Occupational skills cost half (1 construction point = 2 skill points).

general_step.title: General Skills
general_step.subtitle: Allocate your general skill points. Health and Stability are life and sanity pools.
general_step.rule_half_cost: Rule: Occupational skills cost half (1 construction point = 2 skill points).
general_step.overspent: ‚ö† You have exceeded the general points pool

summary_step.title: Character Summary
summary_step.subtitle: Review your character before generating the final sheet

sheet_step.print_hint: Use Ctrl+P / Cmd+P or the print button to save as PDF

anthropology.name: Anthropology
anthropology.description: Knowledge of human cultures, rituals and social behavior.

archaeology.name: Archaeology
archaeology.description: Identify and date artifacts, excavate sites, know ancient civilizations.

architecture.name: Architecture
architecture.description: Design of buildings, hidden structures, blueprints and historical construction.

art_history.name: Art History
art_history.description: Identify art styles, periods, artists and authenticity of works.

biology.name: Biology
biology.description: Knowledge of living organisms, anatomy, botany and zoology.

cryptography.name: Cryptography
cryptography.description: Decipher codes, ciphers and hidden messages.

geology.name: Geology
geology.description: Identify minerals, rocks, geological formations and terrains.

history.name: History
history.description: Knowledge of past events, figures and historical periods.

languages.name: Languages
languages.description: Read, write and speak additional languages (specify which).

law.name: Law
law.description: Knowledge of the legal system, court procedures and regulations.

library_use.name: Library Use
library_use.description: Locate information in archives, libraries and records.

medicine.name: Medicine
medicine.description: Diagnosis of diseases, treatments and human anatomy.

occult.name: Occult
occult.description: Knowledge of magic, folklore, superstition and esoteric traditions.

physics.name: Physics
physics.description: Natural laws, mechanics, electricity and physical sciences.

theology.name: Theology
theology.description: World religions, sacred texts, rituals and beliefs.

assess_honesty.name: Assess Honesty
assess_honesty.description: Detect lies and evaluate people's sincerity.

bargain.name: Bargain
bargain.description: Obtain better prices, favorable conditions in deals.

cop_talk.name: Cop Talk
cop_talk.description: Effectively communicate with police and law enforcement officials.

flattery.name: Flattery
flattery.description: Obtain information or favors through praise and adulation.

intimidation.name: Intimidation
intimidation.description: Obtain cooperation through threats or psychological pressure.

oral_history.name: Oral History
oral_history.description: Obtain information from elders or communities through conversation.

reassurance.name: Reassurance
reassurance.description: Calm frightened or distressed people to obtain information.

streetwise.name: Streetwise
streetwise.description: Move through the underworld, obtain information in criminal environments.

astronomy.name: Astronomy
astronomy.description: Knowledge of celestial bodies, constellations and astronomical phenomena.

chemistry.name: Chemistry
chemistry.description: Identify substances, perform chemical analysis and synthesis.

craft.name: Craft
craft.description: Create physical objects, repair artifacts and specialized manual work.

evidence_collection.name: Evidence Collection
evidence_collection.description: Find, preserve and analyze physical evidence at scenes.

forensics.name: Forensics
forensics.description: Examine corpses, determine causes of death and analyze crimes.

mechanical_repair.name: Mechanical Repair
mechanical_repair.description: Repair and maintain machinery, vehicles and mechanical devices.

photography.name: Photography
photography.description: Take, develop and analyze photographs as evidence.

pharmacy.name: Pharmacy
pharmacy.description: Identify drugs, poisons and pharmacological substances.

athletics.name: Athletics
athletics.description: Running, jumping, climbing, swimming and other physical activities.

conceal.name: Conceal
conceal.description: Hide objects on your person or in the environment.

disguise.name: Disguise
disguise.description: Alter your appearance to pass as another person.

driving.name: Driving
driving.description: Driving cars and other land vehicles.

filch.name: Filch
filch.description: Steal objects without being detected, pickpocketing.

firearms.name: Firearms
firearms.description: Shoot pistols, rifles and other firearms.

fleeing.name: Fleeing
fleeing.description: Escape from pursuers, avoid being caught.

health.name: Health
health.description: Physical stamina and vitality. Maximum Health value.

hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
hypnosis.description: Induce hypnotic states to obtain information or treat trauma.

piloting.name: Piloting
piloting.description: Pilot planes, ships and other aircraft or vessels.

preparedness.name: Preparedness
preparedness.description: Have the right equipment when needed.

psychoanalysis.name: Psychoanalysis
psychoanalysis.description: Treat psychological trauma and restore Stability.

riding.name: Riding
riding.description: Ride and control horses and other mount animals.

sanity.name: Sanity
sanity.description: Mental resistance to cosmic horror. Maximum Sanity value.

sense_trouble.name: Sense Trouble
sense_trouble.description: Perceive threats, ambushes and dangerous situations.

stability.name: Stability
stability.description: Mental health and psychological resilience. Maximum Stability value.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: Move silently and avoid being seen.

weapons.name: Weapons
weapons.description: Use melee weapons: knives, clubs, swords.

antiquarian.name: Antiquarian
antiquarian.description: Collector and expert in ancient objects and rarities. Frequently in contact with artifacts of dubious origin.
antiquarian.pulpAbility: Rarity Collection: Once per session can declare that they possess a relevant object.

author.name: Author
author.description: Novelist, journalist or poet. Acute observer of the human condition.
author.pulpAbility: Sharp Pen: Can use Flattery or Reassurance with an additional die.

clergy.name: Clergy
clergy.description: Religious minister, priest or pastor. Spiritual guide of their community.
clergy.pulpAbility: Unwavering Faith: Recovers 2 additional Stability points after praying.

criminal.name: Criminal
criminal.description: Thief, swindler or member of organized crime. Knows the underworld.
criminal.pulpAbility: Underworld Contacts: Can obtain information or resources from organized crime.

dilettante.name: Dilettante
dilettante.description: Wealthy aristocrat without a fixed profession. Their resources open many doors.
dilettante.pulpAbility: Unlimited Wealth: Once per session can acquire any reasonable equipment.

doctor.name: Doctor
doctor.description: Qualified physician. Deep knowledge of the human body and its ailments.
doctor.pulpAbility: Healing Hands: Can restore 2 additional Health points with First Aid.

engineer.name: Engineer
engineer.description: Expert in construction, mechanics or electrical engineering.
engineer.pulpAbility: Technical Improvisation: Can create devices with materials at hand.

entertainer.name: Entertainer
entertainer.description: Actor, musician or variety artist. Master of disguise and performance.
entertainer.pulpAbility: Master of Disguise: Can assume identities with greater ease.

journalist.name: Journalist
journalist.description: Reporter or correspondent. Always looking for the story behind the story.
journalist.pulpAbility: Protected Sources: Can obtain information from sources that others cannot.

lawyer.name: Lawyer
lawyer.description: Legal expert in the legal system. Skilled negotiator and orator.
lawyer.pulpAbility: Legal Defense: Can get investigators out of legal trouble.

military_officer.name: Military Officer
military_officer.description: Officer of the army, navy or air force. Leadership and combat.
military_officer.pulpAbility: War Veteran: Immune to the effects of Panic in combat.

nurse.name: Nurse
nurse.description: Healthcare professional with practical experience in patient care.
nurse.pulpAbility: Expert Care: Can stabilize the wounded with minimal resources.

occultist.name: Occultist
occultist.description: Student of the arcane, magic and supernatural phenomena.
occultist.pulpAbility: Forbidden Knowledge: Can identify rituals and entities of the Mythos.

parapsychologist.name: Parapsychologist
parapsychologist.description: Scientific investigator of paranormal and psychic phenomena.
parapsychologist.pulpAbility: Sixth Sense: Can detect supernatural presences.

police_detective.name: Police Detective
police_detective.description: Experienced police investigator. Knows crime from the inside.
police_detective.pulpAbility: Police Instinct: Can ask additional questions at crime scenes.

professor.name: Professor
professor.description: University academic. Broad theoretical knowledge and access to resources.
professor.pulpAbility: Erudition: Can attempt any academic skill without spent points.

scientist.name: Scientist
scientist.description: Researcher in natural or exact sciences. Scientific method above all.
scientist.pulpAbility: Analytical Mind: Can repeat a technical skill roll once per scene.

soldier.name: Soldier
soldier.description: Combat veteran. Trained to survive in extreme situations.
soldier.pulpAbility: Survival Instinct: Can act on the first turn of combat without a roll.

spy.name: Spy
spy.description: Intelligence agent. Master of deception and infiltration.
spy.pulpAbility: False Identity: Has multiple cover identities prepared.

tribal_member.name: Tribal Member
tribal_member.description: Native of an indigenous culture. Unique knowledge of ancient traditions.
tribal_member.pulpAbility: Ancestral Wisdom: Knows rituals and legends that others ignore.

thrill.name: Thrill of Adventure
thrill.description: You live for the adrenaline. Danger attracts you instead of repelling you.
thrill.stabilityBonus: You recover 1 additional Stability point when you overcome a combat.

duty.name: Duty
duty.description: You have an obligation to fulfill, whether to your country, your faith or your code of honor.
duty.stabilityBonus: You recover 1 Stability point when you fulfill your duty.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.description: Someone or something destroyed something you loved. You will find justice.
revenge.stabilityBonus: You recover 2 Stability points when you advance towards your revenge.

love.name: Love
love.description: You protect someone you love or seek to reunite with them.
love.stabilityBonus: You recover 1 Stability point when you protect your loved one.

greed.name: Greed
greed.description: Money and power motivate you. There is always something to gain.
greed.stabilityBonus: You recover 1 Stability point when you obtain a significant reward.

patriotism.name: Patriotism
patriotism.description: You serve your nation with pride. The good of your country is your good.
patriotism.stabilityBonus: You recover 1 Stability point when you serve the interests of your nation.

faith.name: Faith
faith.description: Your religious or spiritual belief gives you strength before the inexplicable.
faith.stabilityBonus: You recover 2 Stability points when your faith is confirmed or put to the test.

curiosity.name: Curiosity
curiosity.description: You need to know. Mysteries consume you until you solve them.
curiosity.stabilityBonus: You recover 1 Stability point when you discover an important hidden truth.

protection.name: Protection
protection.description: You protect the innocent from threats they cannot see.
protection.stabilityBonus: You recover 2 Stability points when you save someone from a supernatural danger.

knowledge.name: Knowledge
knowledge.description: The truth, however dark, must be known and documented.
knowledge.stabilityBonus: You recover 1 Stability point when you document an important discovery.

justice.name: Justice
justice.description: Evil must be punished. You are the balance between law and chaos.
justice.stabilityBonus: You recover 2 Stability points when you bring a criminal to justice.

survival.name: Survival
survival.description: You simply want to get out alive. That's enough motivation.
survival.stabilityBonus: You recover 1 Stability point at the end of each session you survive.

person.name: A Person
person.description: Someone whose existence and well-being anchors your sanity.

place.name: A Place
place.description: A place that represents safety, home or normalcy for you.

belief.name: A Belief or Ideal
belief.description: A principle, faith or ideal that gives meaning to your existence.
